mapper.select: select * from portfoliocomment WHERE portfolio_no=#{portfolio_no} order by reg_date DESC LIMIT #{start_index}, 10
mapper.insert: insert into portfoliocomment(user_no, portfolio_no, content, reg_date, comment_private, commenter_name, profile_img) VALUES (#{user_no}, #{portfolio_no}, #{content}, #{reg_date}, #{comment_private}, #{commenter_name}, #{profile_img})
mapper.update: update portfoliocomment SET comment_private=#{comment_private}, commenter_name=#{commenter_name}, profile_img=#{profile_img} WHERE comment_no=#{comment_no}
